text: tatha aap unhen dekhenge ki ve prastut kiye ja rahe hain narak par, sir jhukaaye, apamaan ke kaaran. ve dekh rahe honge kankhiyon se tatha kahenge jo eemaan laaye ki vaastav mein ghaate mein vahee hain, jinhonne ghaate mein daal diya svayan ko tatha apane parivaar ko, pralay ke din. suno! atyaachaaree hee sthaayee yaatana mein honge
